inclusion.criterion: Excessive weight gain during their previous pregnancy (above the IOM recommendations)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Child wish for having a next pregnancy
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Able to give written informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of or a plan for bariatric surgery
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Underlying or chronic disorders (e.g. diabetes, thyroid disease, renal diseases)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 5 months old male with an abdominal undescended testis. He has no developmental delay and is breast feeding.
